spec_data.Name: opencv-devel
spec_data.Description:
This package contains the OpenCV C/C++ library and header files, as well as
documentation. It should be installed if you want to develop programs that
will use the OpenCV library. You should consider installing opencv-devel-docs
package.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 27 Oct 2017 10:54:24 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development files for using the OpenCV library
